SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

ANTI_FAKE_REMOVE.description: Fake number auto remover (Except Indian numbers)! Give true for activating!

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

ALIVE_LOGO.description: Alive message logo. Enter your image link below to change the image. (Upload the image you want to https://imgbb.com and put that link here.)

IG_USER.description: Add Your instagram user name for alive message

WHATS_LINK_BLOCK.description: Whatsapp Link Blocking System [ only whatsapp links ] .

EMOJI_COMMAND.description: You can change Command list emojis.

EMOJI_DESCRIPTION.description: You can change command list emojis.

EMOJI_WARNING.description: You can change command list emojis.

BUTTON_DESC.description: Add Your Customisible Button Discription Text For Customisible Button

BUTTON_ONE.description: Add Your Customisible Button Display Text For Button One [click button]

BUTTON_TWO.description: Add Your Customisible Button Display Text For Button TWO [click button]

BUTTON_REPLY_ONE.description: Add Your Customisible Button reply for Button One

BUTTON_REPLY_TWO.description: Add Your Customisible Button reply for Button One

THERI_KICK_GP.description: will remove members from group if they use bad words given in THERI_LIST_GP , if true

NUMBER.description: give your orginal phone number if you wish to add it in .number cmnd

THERI_KICK_PM.description: will block members if they use bad words given in THERI_LIST_PM , if true

THERI_LIST_GP.description: enter the word you dont allow in your group

THERI_LIST_PM.description: enter the words you dont allow in your pm

PANEL_COMMAND.description: Customizeable commands list request command. Keep alexa if you don't want to change.

OWNER_NAME.description: reply for .owner ! give your details, Use => default, to change back.

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

NO_LOG.description: Hata logu görmek istemiyorsanız true yapın. Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Görüldü atmak istiyorsanız true yazın. Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by pinky bot

MENU_INFO.description: write Some Words about yor Bot You can Edit this

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

TALKING_JIMBRU.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: 🧞 Jimbrootan  Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot. and if you use “admin”, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! use {pp} if you want to add profile picture also add {qt} if you want to add qoutes in your welcome message

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable kick Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable leave Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

CHANGE_BGM_TO.description: Dont leave this blank choose the bgm you need - enter one or two

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
